ViewObject.Name: ODSiteTeamAccessesVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT update_flag from ( SELECT nvl(CURR_PS.identifying_address_flag,'N') update_flag FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ASSN, HZ_PARTY_SITES CURR_PS, HZ_PARTY_SITES ALL_PS WHERE CURR_ASSN.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND CURR_ASSN.entity_id = CURR_PS.party_site_id AND ALL_PS.party_site_id = :1 AND ALL_PS.party_id = CURR_PS.party_id and CURR_PS.status = 'A' and CURR_ASSN.resource_id = :2 group by nvl(CURR_PS.identifying_address_flag,'N') UNION SELECT 'Y' update_flag FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ASSN WHERE CURR_ASSN.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' AND CURR_ASSN.entity_id = :1 AND CURR_ASSN.resource_id = :2 ) order by 1 desc
